price: Ìyẹn ni Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra tí A óò jogún rẹ̀ fún ẹni tí ó jẹ́ olùbẹ̀rù (Mi) nínú àwọn ẹrúsìn Wa.
arabic: تِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِي نُورِثُ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: til'ka al-janatu allatī nūrithu min ʿibādinā man kāna taqiyyan
